Class FantasySharedSamplers

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.soton.fpl.game.FantasySharedSamplers

  • public class FantasySharedSamplers
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FantasyPointsSampler getPointsSampler(FantasyGameweek oGameweek)
      Return a points sampler for the given gameweek This points sampler can be used to 'simulate' the gameweek and return the points scores of the players within it
      FantasySquadAssessor getSquadAssessor(FantasyGameweek oGameweek)
      Retrieve a squad assessor for the given gameweek This squad assessor will return the expected points score of a squad across a large number of samples

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
